experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: Collaborate with product managers and other SDEs to design and implement new features, write unit tests, set up integration tests, and write documentation to enhance the efficiency of Amazon delivery system.
Provide additional support during on-call rotation. This includes troubleshooting unforeseen problems with current services, maintaining hosts, and fixing CI/CD pipelines.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Enhance security measures of Nimble OS SDK by adding new features that support different types of users.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Worked on the voice assistant module; build functions to respond to users' voice input.
Implement JWT creation and verification on the core security module.
